00033   const uint32_t MAX_SEND_BUFFER_SIZE = 1000000;

00040 TableMutatorScatterBuffer::TableMutatorScatterBuffer(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, Comm *comm, TableIdentifier *table_identifier, SchemaPtr &schema_ptr, RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator_ptr) : m_props_ptr(props_ptr), m_comm(comm), m_schema_ptr(schema_ptr), m_range_locator_ptr(range_locator_ptr), m_range_server(comm, HYPERTABLE_CLIENT_TIMEOUT), m_table_identifier(table_identifier), m_full(false), m_resends(0) {
00041 
00042   m_range_locator_ptr->get_location_cache(m_cache_ptr);
00043 }

00050 void TableMutatorScatterBuffer::set(Key &key, const void *value, uint32_t value_len, Timer &timer) {
00051   RangeLocationInfo range_info;
00052   TableMutatorSendBufferMapT::const_iterator iter;
00053 
00054   if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(m_table_identifier.id, key.row, &range_info)) {
00055     timer.start();
00056     m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, key.row, &range_info, timer, false);
00057   }
00058 
00059   iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00060 
00061   if (iter == m_buffer_map.end()) {
00062     m_buffer_map[range_info.location] = new TableMutatorSendBuffer(&m_table_identifier, &m_completion_counter, m_range_locator_ptr.get());
00063     iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00064 
00065     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(range_info.location.c_str(), (*iter).second->addr))
00066       throw Exception(Error::INVALID_METADATA, range_info.location);
00067   }
00068 
00069   (*iter).second->key_offsets.push_back((*iter).second->accum.fill());
00070   create_key_and_append((*iter).second->accum, FLAG_INSERT, key.row, key.column_family_code, key.column_qualifier, key.timestamp);
00071   append_as_byte_string((*iter).second->accum, value, value_len);
00072 
00073   if ((*iter).second->accum.fill() > MAX_SEND_BUFFER_SIZE)
00074     m_full = true;
00075 }

00081 void TableMutatorScatterBuffer::set_delete(Key &key, Timer &timer) {
00082   RangeLocationInfo range_info;
00083   TableMutatorSendBufferMapT::const_iterator iter;
00084 
00085   if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(m_table_identifier.id, key.row, &range_info)) {
00086     timer.start();
00087     m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, key.row, &range_info, timer, false);
00088   }
00089 
00090   iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00091 
00092   if (iter == m_buffer_map.end()) {
00093     m_buffer_map[range_info.location] = new TableMutatorSendBuffer(&m_table_identifier, &m_completion_counter, m_range_locator_ptr.get());
00094     iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00095 
00096     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(range_info.location.c_str(), (*iter).second->addr))
00097       throw Exception(Error::INVALID_METADATA, range_info.location);
00098   }
00099 
00100   (*iter).second->key_offsets.push_back((*iter).second->accum.fill());
00101   uint8_t key_flag;
00102   if (key.column_family_code == 0)
00103     key_flag = FLAG_DELETE_ROW;
00104   else if (key.column_qualifier)
00105     key_flag = FLAG_DELETE_CELL;
00106   else
00107     key_flag = FLAG_DELETE_COLUMN_FAMILY;
00108 
00109   create_key_and_append((*iter).second->accum, key_flag, key.row, key.column_family_code, key.column_qualifier, key.timestamp);
00110   append_as_byte_string((*iter).second->accum, 0, 0);
00111 
00112   if ((*iter).second->accum.fill() > MAX_SEND_BUFFER_SIZE)
00113     m_full = true;
00114 }

00121 void TableMutatorScatterBuffer::set(ByteString key, ByteString value, Timer &timer) {
00122   RangeLocationInfo range_info;
00123   TableMutatorSendBufferMapT::const_iterator iter;
00124   uint8_t *ptr = key.ptr;
00125   size_t len = Serialization::decode_vi32((const uint8_t **)&ptr);
00126 
00127   if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(m_table_identifier.id, (const char *)ptr, &range_info)) {
00128     timer.start();
00129     m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, (const char *)ptr, &range_info, timer, false);
00130   }
00131 
00132   iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00133 
00134   if (iter == m_buffer_map.end()) {
00135     m_buffer_map[range_info.location] = new TableMutatorSendBuffer(&m_table_identifier, &m_completion_counter, m_range_locator_ptr.get());
00136     iter = m_buffer_map.find(range_info.location);
00137 
00138     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(range_info.location.c_str(), (*iter).second->addr))
00139       throw Exception(Error::INVALID_METADATA, range_info.location);
00140   }
00141 
00142   (*iter).second->key_offsets.push_back((*iter).second->accum.fill());
00143   (*iter).second->accum.add(key.ptr, (ptr-key.ptr)+len);
00144   (*iter).second->accum.add(value.ptr, value.length());
00145 
00146   if ((*iter).second->accum.fill() > MAX_SEND_BUFFER_SIZE)
00147     m_full = true;
00148 }

00150 
00151 namespace {
00152   struct ltByteStringChronological {
00153     bool operator()(const ByteString bs1, const ByteString bs2) const {
00154       uint8_t *ptr1, *ptr2;
00155       size_t len1 = bs1.decode_length(&ptr1);
00156       size_t len2 = bs2.decode_length(&ptr2);
00157       int rval = strcmp((const char *)ptr1, (const char *)ptr2);
00158       if (rval == 0) {
00159         ptr1 += len1 - 8;
00160         ptr2 += len2 - 8;
00161         return memcmp(ptr1, ptr2, 8) > 0;  // this gives chronological
00162       }
00163       return rval < 0;
00164     }
00165   };
00166 }

00172 void TableMutatorScatterBuffer::send() {
00173   TableMutatorSendBufferPtr send_buffer_ptr;
00174   struct ltByteStringChronological swo_bs;
00175   std::vector<ByteString> kvec;
00176   uint8_t *ptr;
00177   ByteString bs;
00178 
00179   m_completion_counter.set(m_buffer_map.size());
00180 
00181   for (TableMutatorSendBufferMapT::const_iterator iter = m_buffer_map.begin(); iter != m_buffer_map.end(); iter++) {
00182     send_buffer_ptr = (*iter).second;
00183     kvec.clear();
00184     kvec.reserve( send_buffer_ptr->key_offsets.size() );
00185     for (size_t i=0; i<send_buffer_ptr->key_offsets.size(); i++)
00186       kvec.push_back((ByteString)(send_buffer_ptr->accum.base + send_buffer_ptr->key_offsets[i]));
00187     sort(kvec.begin(), kvec.end(), swo_bs);
00188     size_t len = send_buffer_ptr->accum.fill();
00189 
00190     send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.set(new uint8_t [ len ], len);
00191     ptr = send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.base;
00192 
00193     for (size_t i=0; i<kvec.size(); i++) {
00194       bs = kvec[i];
00195       bs.next();  // skip key
00196       bs.next();  // skip value
00197       memcpy(ptr, kvec[i].ptr, bs.ptr - kvec[i].ptr);
00198       ptr += bs.ptr - kvec[i].ptr;
00199     }
00200     send_buffer_ptr->accum.clear();
00201     HT_EXPECT((size_t)(ptr-send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.base)==len, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00202 
00203     send_buffer_ptr->dispatch_handler_ptr = new TableMutatorDispatchHandler(send_buffer_ptr.get());
00204 
00208     try {
00209       send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.own = false;
00210       m_range_server.update(send_buffer_ptr->addr, m_table_identifier, send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates, send_buffer_ptr->dispatch_handler_ptr.get());
00211     }
00212     catch (Exception &e) {
00213       send_buffer_ptr->add_retries(0, send_buffer_ptr->pending_updates.size);
00214       m_completion_counter.decrement();
00215     }
00216   }
00217 }

00224 bool TableMutatorScatterBuffer::completed() {
00225   return m_completion_counter.is_complete();
00226 }

00233 bool TableMutatorScatterBuffer::wait_for_completion(Timer &timer) {
00234   if (!m_completion_counter.wait_for_completion(timer)) {
00235     if (m_completion_counter.has_errors()) {
00236       TableMutatorSendBufferPtr send_buffer_ptr;
00237       std::vector<FailedRegionT> failed_regions;
00238 
00239       for (TableMutatorSendBufferMapT::const_iterator iter = m_buffer_map.begin(); iter != m_buffer_map.end(); iter++)
00240         (*iter).second->get_failed_regions(failed_regions);
00241 
00242       if (!failed_regions.empty()) {
00243         Cell cell;
00244         Key key;
00245         ByteString bs;
00246         uint8_t *endptr;
00247         Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00248         for (size_t i=0; i<failed_regions.size(); i++) {
00249           bs.ptr = failed_regions[i].base;
00250           endptr = bs.ptr + failed_regions[i].len;
00251           while (bs.ptr < endptr) {
00252             key.load(bs);
00253             cell.row_key = key.row;
00254             cf = m_schema_ptr->get_column_family(key.column_family_code);
00255             HT_EXPECT(cf, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00256             cell.column_family = m_constant_strings.get(cf->name.c_str());
00257             cell.column_qualifier = key.column_qualifier;
00258             cell.timestamp = key.timestamp;
00259             bs.next();
00260             cell.value_len = bs.decode_length((uint8_t **)&cell.value);
00261             bs.next();
00262             m_failed_mutations.push_back(std::make_pair(cell, failed_regions[i].error));
00263           }
00264         }
00265       }
00266 
00267       // this prevents this mutation failure logic from being executed twice
00268       // if this method gets called again
00269       m_completion_counter.clear_errors();
00270 
00271       if (m_failed_mutations.size() > 0)
00272         throw Exception(failed_regions[0].error);
00273 
00274     }
00275     return false;
00276   }
00277   return true;
00278 }

00281 TableMutatorScatterBuffer *TableMutatorScatterBuffer::create_redo_buffer(Timer &timer) {
00282   TableMutatorSendBufferPtr send_buffer_ptr;
00283   ByteString key, value, bs;
00284   TableMutatorScatterBuffer *redo_buffer = 0;
00285 
00286   try {
00287 
00288     redo_buffer = new TableMutatorScatterBuffer(m_props_ptr, m_comm, &m_table_identifier, m_schema_ptr, m_range_locator_ptr);
00289   
00290     for (TableMutatorSendBufferMapT::const_iterator iter = m_buffer_map.begin(); iter != m_buffer_map.end(); iter++) {
00291       send_buffer_ptr = (*iter).second;
00292 
00293       if (send_buffer_ptr->accum.fill()) {
00294         uint8_t *endptr;
00295 
00296         bs.ptr = send_buffer_ptr->accum.base;
00297         endptr = bs.ptr + send_buffer_ptr->accum.fill();
00298 
00299         // now add all of the old keys to the redo buffer
00300         while (bs.ptr < endptr) {
00301           key.ptr = bs.next();
00302           value.ptr = bs.next();
00303           redo_buffer->set(key, value, timer);
00304           m_resends++;
00305         }
00306       }
00307 
00308     }
00309   }
00310   catch (Exception &e) {
00311     delete redo_buffer;
00312     throw;
00313   }
00314 
00315   return redo_buffer;
00316 }

00319 void TableMutatorScatterBuffer::reset() {
00320   for (TableMutatorSendBufferMapT::const_iterator iter = m_buffer_map.begin(); iter != m_buffer_map.end(); iter++)
00321     (*iter).second->reset();
00322 }
